Class StickyListHeadersAdapterDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.BaseAdapterDecorator
        • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.swinginadapters.StickyListHeadersAdapterDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SectionIndexer, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.util.ListViewWrapperSetter, com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.util.Swappable, se.emilsjolander.stickylistheaders.StickyListHeadersAdapter

    public class StickyListHeadersAdapterDecorator
extends com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.BaseAdapterDecorator
implements se.emilsjolander.stickylistheaders.StickyListHeadersAdapter
    A BaseAdapterDecorator which can be used to animate header views provided by a StickyListHeadersAdapter.
